description: This table contains information about Additional Information Request records. This includes links to the patient, referrals, communications, and documents.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the Additional Information Request record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status of this Additional Information Request (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: EXTERNAL_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: The Additional Information Request's external ID number.

columns.name: INFO_REQUEST_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The request context category ID for the Additional Information Request record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Prior Authorization

columns.name: INFO_REQ_ACTV_USE_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The active use status category ID for the Additional Information Request record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Finalized


Canceled

columns.name: CREATION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this Additional Information Request was created.

columns.name: CREATION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this Additional Information Request was created.

columns.name: LAST_UPD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this Additional Information Request was last updated.

columns.name: LAST_UPD_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this Additional Information Request was last updated.

columns.name: COMPLETION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this Additional Information Request record was finalized or canceled.

columns.name: COMPLETION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this Additional Information Request record was finalized or canceled.

columns.name: COMPLETION_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of user who finalized or canceled this Additional Information Request.

columns.name: INFO_REQ_ORG_ROLE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The organization role for your organization in this Additional Information Request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Payer

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient or member around whom all communication in this Additional Information Request is based.

columns.name: PA_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The prior authorization referral record ID which this Additional Information Request belongs to.

columns.name: PA_AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: The authorization request ID of the prior authorization which this Additional Information Request belongs to.
